body: What happened to the English version
This really need an English publish.

Ayo No Cap, Junk Centre Kameyoko Has One Of The Best Art I've Ever Seen On This Whole Mfing Site. Like It Might Just Be Personal Preference, But Like God Damn This Art Is Good. Their Shit Needs To Be Translated More Man..

To all innocent souls that have stumbled into this comment section, If you are reading this, you are immune to all current or future curses on this site. Copy and paste this to 5 other manga, so others may be saved as well. I'm doing this to help y'all out. Stay safe everyone.
